page.title: 02POPULATION OF FORTHAMPTON
page.content: Forthampton has a population of 150 people. This is a decline from 100 years ago when the population was 237. A quarter of the people in the village are old age pensioners and only 6 are children of school age. Many people in the village remember the time when there were 20 or more school children waiting for the bus each morning. There are other indicators of a changing population structure in the village. The church choir, the day school and the Sunday school were all once flourishing parts of the community and are all now closed. Even the local youth club has almost closed due to lack of numbers.
